name: NOLET’S Cucumber Smash
preparation:
No need to be delicate with this recipe. Grab your muddler, NOLET’S Silver Gin, fresh mint and cucumber. Then smash your way to a mouthwatering cocktail. This is how you make a Cucumber Smash.

Muddle the cucumber and mint with simple syrup and lemon juice in a pint glass or mixing tin.

Add NOLET'S Silver Gin, ice and shake well.

Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.

Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cucumber slice.
